urlLink SSN Wong Yoke Ho urlLink
urlLink Clockwise: Choon Yen, QingYing, Me, Xiuwen, Karen and Auntie Chereta urlLink

NO BIRDS IS TOO HIGH UP IN THE SKY FOR YOU TO SHOOT DOWN. NOTHING IS FOR FREE. REAP WHAT YOU SOW. NO MATTER WHAT HAPPEN, BELIEVE IN YOURSELF. LIFE AND LOVE, IS LIKE MUSIC, THERE ARE UPS AND DOWNS, TIMES WHICH HARD AND SOFT. THINGS ARE ALWAYS BEYOND OUR MEANS. DO NOT TAKE FOR GRANTED. WHEN WE SEEK TO DISCOVER THE BEST IN OTHERS AND BY CHANCE, WE SOMEHOW BRING OUT THE BEST IN OURSELVES. DON'T UNDERMINE YOUR WORTH BY COMPARING YOURSELF WITH OTHERS, IT IS BECAUSE WE ARE DIFFERENT THAT EACH OF US IS SPECIAL.

hey guys...what's up. well i'm now busy building another website for my poems...and also busy with my Wendy Gonzalez website (latin actress)....so happy that now I'm a free person. Didn't came across my mind that it is just 10 days after my resignation day. Can feel that my mind and soul is at peace now now. However quite boring. I think I can deal with that. i will update you guys with my poems website..i'm very happy that Wendy's mother had actually updated me with Wendy's new soap opera...and due to wendy tight schedule she actually asked her mum to email me instead...im so touch man...hehehe..take care kammy

hey guys..i'm back. well, lets see. i'm still waiting for job reply. to put in simple word....yeah i'm jobles...lol. the past days, minutes, seconds and hours or mths that I've been MIA....what have I been doing? I'm busy watching television, surfing the net all those uninteresting things lah which I will not bored you with. So Yanping you wanna know what I have been up to? have I miss working? Can you be more precised? hehe. you mean nursing? yeah what else is there right? well, frankly speaking I do not miss it not even a bit. But I miss all my collegues friends very much. You must be thinking what the heck am I trying to say right. Well, I don't miss nursing because when i started to be an ex-nurse...nursing misses me so much.it came and haunt me. you guys must think that im nuts but im not. let me explained..one of my sister is sick and being in the same room i had to take care of her...and my task is so heavy...like working night shift...i have to make sure she didnt fell and stuff...hehehe. i have to be awake every now and then to see whether she slept well..walau eh..sleepless night man. then one by one my sisters take turns to be sick...and im having heartache and really stress up...what happened man? im going insane.hahahaha...lalalala. then my grand-dad in hospital in TTSH CCU...heart attack..collapsed, got intubated...on u/cath, on iv N/s, iv dormicum, both hands restrained, on ryles tube...some many stuffs happened. sigh...many many problems. oh GOD!!! what happened man...and sorry that now and then i have seldom sms you guys cause...since im jobless im oso moneyless....so i try to cut down on certain things...but please dont stop sms me...hehehe...i think thats for now...take care. GOD BLESS. miss you guys so much.
